Laser pen calibration:
Put the crossbow in a secured vise and shoot at a sheet target 15 ft away.
Keep the vice and crossbow as is.
Mount the laser pen to the mark it made using shims.
Glue it down as it’s still on the mark.
The original projectile is now set to the calibration.
